lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's called karma. First and foremost, we're going to get through our announcements for the evening so we can hop into the game. First off, tonight's awesome sponsor returning to us is Backblaze.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, are we good, guys? Are we good? What's going on over there? There's lots of people pulling out their hair.

lines.text: I think we're having sound issues.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Hold on just a second.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A lot of people doing this. (panicked sounds)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Out of sync, is what they're saying.

lines.name: OFFSCREEN
lines.text: All right, Twitch has sound.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Twitch has sound? We're good to go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have to give me the answer. I can give you two clues, like two words, and you buzz in and tell me what the words are. Here's a hint. Here's a clue: all the answers are the same. Okay, so like, for instance, if I were to say, the rear part of your chest and what a fire does--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Backblaze.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Here the game begins. The opposite color of white, and the topmost part of a helicopter.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Classical composer Johann Sebastian, and a hairstyle made popular by Pippi Longstocking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bach braids!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Laura Bailey. Two points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there a buzzer system?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pages of paper bound together and a climbing or rappel technique.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Binder rappel!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Brad! No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Book rappel. Book belay. Book belay! (laughs) I'm the smartest man alive!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it two-to-two right now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought pages binded together. I was going to say brad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, this is not a real game. I invented this on the drive over! Okay, one more. You know what? You guys aren't playing anymore. This is between Laura and Travis. You know what? I'm going to do two more, just because I love them. Popular Ben Folds Five song, and the abrasive sound a donkey makes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Brick bray!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a great story, fantastic cast, incredible writing, and very much hearkens to the isometric, Baldur's Gate, Planescape Torment-style RPG format of the early 2000s. I highly recommend it. You should check it out. I think it's in Steam now, and hope you like it. Next up, my first episode of the new GM Tips series is out today. It goes a little behind my screen, and gives some ideas as to how you can set up your own GM circumstance and experience. Mind you, most of it's just fluff. You don't need any of that to run a game. You can just have books, dice, paper, and pens, and you're good to go. But these are just suggestions and an example of the things that I do to run my game smoothly, and you should check it out if you'd like it. New episodes will be coming out every Wednesday on Alpha, I suppose, and then on Thursdays coming out on YouTube and the website proper.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it pronounced GM tips, or gmmm tips?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And if it is, you should go ahead and help support it, so check it out. It's Open Legend RPG. That's all my announcements. Does anybody else have anything they want to talk about?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about our Halloween costume competition?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've been seeing some of them. It's Critical Costumes, is the hashtag, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: #CriticalCostumes. You explained the competition?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Next week, I think, is where we're stopping. Halloween will be the last day?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On Halloween.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Halloween's the last day to submit, and then we're all just going to look at all your costumes and just decide who we like.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I will say I had a cat dress up as my character, so the bar is pretty high.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I saw a really amazing Vex today. I'm just saying, I may be biased.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So just to be clear, the winners are not going to be announced next week. It's the week after.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the week after. The first Thursday of November, we'll be announcing the winners.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't know what the prizes are. But it will include my shirts.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your sweaty shirts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But not that shirt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, this is my shirt. Forever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [dramatic music]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: --balanced breakfast!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway, welcome back. So to continue from where we left off for tonight's episode of Critical Role, Vox Machina, our heroic players and characters, in fighting their way across the land of Tal'Dorei against the Chrome Conclave, a gathering of ancient chromatic dragons that have torn the current civilization asunder. They've gathered a number of artifacts of old called the Vestiges of Divergence and recently made allies with one of these dragons, Raishan, the green dragon of the conclave, apparently interested in revolting against the conclave's leader, Thordak the Cinder King. A tentative alliance has been forged and to prove both the stalwartness of that alliance, as well as to further your agenda against the conclave, you all traveled back to Wildemount, to the ruins of Draconia. With the help of the Ravenites you set a trap for Vorugal, the Frigid Doom. You summoned, using your single Gate scroll, from the Abyss, Yenk the Goristro, a great, powerful siege demon and caused it to battle with the white dragon. Partway through, the encounter got more intense, you all rushed into the fray. Got the crap kicked out of you in a lot of cases but when all was said and done, with the aid of Raishan, you felled Vorugal. The final shot being landed by Vex'ahlia herself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's where we pick up this week. What would you like to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Man, we've gotta find Larkin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you have dragon bits you wanted to gather?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did, very much so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And some Yenk, I imagine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A little bit of Yenk, a little bit of dragon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got a little Yenk blood already.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Brazen, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, you're heading to the dragon or Yenk first?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you guys head over there. You now see partially elements of the wall that had crumbled in on Vorugal's body. You see now, emerging from the center of the scales in the chest as it lays on its back, slain, its throat torn out by Raishan, a piercing tree begins to burrow its way through the torso of the dragon and bloom outwards. Waiting for that process to finish, you bring out your carving dagger and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I patiently wait for the tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't want to interrupt. That's rude.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It grows pretty fast as part of the enchantment of Fenthras. So, that brief pause completed, you go to town with your blade on the dragon's corpse. Let's go ahead and make a check on this. This would be--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nature, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With advantage. Oh, that's good. 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28, okay. It'll take you the better part of about an hour to really harvest everything you want from this that's usable, and that's with aid from Scanlan, because it's a very big dragon, and that's a pretty small blade. So you begin that process.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can help. I want to go up and carve a bear onto the tree growing out of Vorugal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I may lend my cut-dragon-like-butter blade to this whole process.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that really hard to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You spend the next minute and a half going (grunting sounds). It's not budging.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's actually three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, the next minute and 20 seconds going (grunting sounds).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do manage to found a couple loose scales on the ground nearby after you've thoroughly embarrassed yourself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll grab one and then I'll immediately start yelling for Tooma. (yelling) Tooma!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, while he's doing that, what are you guys doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, so the dragon's got booty, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, like a lot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So I look over and they're working on the dragon bits. Everything's cool? Yenk is like melting into the snow, right, because he's like a hell fiend or whatever?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take off running towards the lair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go with.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog's already run off. Scanlan's following.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to Polymorph into an eagle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fucking fuck! Do you guys have this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Give me a claw. I want a claw to wear around my neck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're going to be like Mr. T.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fucking something, all right!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll find something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll take off on the broom after Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just scooping up Pike into a bit of a piggy back ride and carrying her inside and we're going to rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. She's thoroughly hurt, but you still have the entrance to the mansion. Yeah, so you guys pull into there to rest for the moment. While Grog, as you're running, this eagle comes up to your side, is gaining on you a bit. As you come over the top of this one little ridge area, as the ravine begins to widen and head towards the lair portion that Vorugal was using, you see before you a group of about 22 or so armored dragonborn that are currently jogging up the ramp in your direction. As soon as you cross over the top they come to a slower point, with their weapons out, and you see one of them raise its hand. You recognize Skork, who you met earlier, who goes, "We've come to aid you!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm still raging using Persistent Rage and I point over my shoulder and yell, Dragon that way! And I keep running past them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right! They pick up their weapons and keep running past you as you [whoosh] through them, the eagle following closely after.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is Tooma with them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tooma is not with them, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I followed too. I am following as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you coast up behind, you begin catching up to Grog and the wayward eagle. You're the fastest of everything right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm following him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They approach and slow their jog and look over at the destroyed corpse of the dragon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Things went well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, how long of a jog is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all look confused at each other and start talking to each other in a language you don't understand.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, ooh, Vex isn't here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. All good. Good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They nod and Skork gives a respectful nod and they all approach the dragon's corpse and start hacking into it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no, wait, no. Hold on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Go back. Everything's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Skork takes two steps forward and goes, "I understand this speak."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, why didn't you say something? You're standing there making us very nervous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (disgruntled grunt) "Look. We have to come to aid you in the battle as promised. You have "seemingly done well without our presence. So let's all harvest the uses of what remains of this beast."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm fair with that, all right. Harvest gently. We're trying to keep as much of it--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, I'm working right here on this area and Vex wants a claw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Take what you wish. We are interested in hide and meat."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we are interested in scale, tooth, and claw, and maybe some eyeballs, so that works out very well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And blood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps some teeth and claws as well. We shall trade." (speaks Draconic) All of them rush up and start hacking into the soft portions of the underbelly, where it's been exposed from where you guys have left large wounds and such and basically start to carve huge bits of dragon meat off the body.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mind the tree. Mind the tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them was going for the tree and stops like-- And then looks very confused that the tree wasn't piercing through the dragon, but was rooted inside of it. They all take a moment to start carving around it. It's a very awkward. They don't know what the hell happened and it looks very strange from an outsider's perspective, but they're trying to adjust best they can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: New town square will be built around it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the meantime, the three of you guys coast down towards the lair. You can still see all the ice spires that are jutting out from portions of the snow, the various dragonborn corpses still adorning a number of the spires. As you begin to approach the throne of Vorugal, you can see there's a group of about 15 or so dragonborn currently there that are starting to climb up and get to that portion to inspect. You see, first, before anyone else does, Vex, that one of them appears to be Tooma, who is walking with this gnarled staff that she keeps to her side. And they're all approaching and climbing up the sides of the throne to get to the top.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I shout out, don't go up there!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You shout that and there's a moment of pause. Then, all of them turn and look in your direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I fly down close to Tooma and say quietly, Thordak has means of seeing through the stones up there. If you go up top, it's possible he'll be able to know that Vorugal has fallen. He might already know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You understand her saying, "Hold off. Words of warning." They all pull back and gather around you, and stand, awaiting what this conversation is going to entail as Tooma steps forward to you. "So "am I to understand, then, that the dragon has fallen?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughing) Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll drop my form and throw the scale in front of her. It's done. There's your fucking dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks over at the rest of the people who are all looking towards her for confirmation. She goes, "You came to us with words. You stood behind them. You displayed honor and honesty, things we "find rare in supply outside of our people. Us, the Ravenites, survivors of chain and frost, are now "truly free. We thank you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we'll need something more than just thanks. We have two requests to make of you. One, this is not the final fight. There will be more, and unlike this fight, we would expect your aid in the next one. Is that something you can guarantee us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am curious as to what you require from us."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't know yet, but you have many men, and they seem like good fighters, so we may call upon you in the future.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Against what foe?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thordak the Ancient. He was commander of all of these dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see her face immediately goes from that calm, welcoming, elated expression she had a moment ago to this guarded, retracted position where she shifts her weight onto the back leg and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You are not beholden to us. We ask this of your own free will. All of Tal'Dorei is at risk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We are not an army. We wish to help in

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hopefully, it won't be immediately. And might I remind you that you did

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Who do you think arranged, through previous conversation, to send the dragon your way into the "trap that you had sprung? At my suggestion of the place of proper, and most conventional and helpful "circumstances?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's true, Scanlan, they did help a lot in that regard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We may not have the might to finish the dragon--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You told us that you would have men there to help us, and there was nothing. We almost died.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We sent men your way!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You knew when the fight was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We knew when to begin the fight, but we do not have means of travelling as fast as a dragon!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm running around like a cracked-out PCP addict in the background. Just looking on the ground for booty, that's all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is snow and ice and it's pissing you off!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm doing the dog thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: More snow. More and more snow. In the middle of this conversation, some of it starts spattering the side of Vex. You're like, "Stop it!" Angrily rage-looting nothing. (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Draconia has had a history of separating itself from the rest of Tal'Dorei. This is an opportunity for

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You are right. [no audio] And from this, I think we could try to rebuild, a new home for the "dragonborn of Wildemount. Learn from the mistakes of our predecessors and our oppressors. We are no "majestic mage nation by any means, but we can learn."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You are strong.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Could you build a statue, a fine statue, a handsome statue of Tiberius Stormwind, and bury him underneath it. And on the pedestal, could you please write, "I encourage peace."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks over at one of the nearby dragonborn. "This is Korsa. He is our finest "stonesmith. I will see to it that it is done."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Teach your people of him, your offspring, that he was a brave dragonborn that wanted to unify all of your peoples.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This can be done. (sighs) This mound represents the spoils of the remains of Draconia "the dragon greedily stole, hoarded, and forced us to gather at the base of its icy seat. This will "be the beginning of our new nation, and with this, we will make sure this statue comes to bear."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good luck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you looking for?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Help me look!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For what? What are we looking for?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I make another perception check, please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What am I looking for? Grog, what am I looking for?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're looking for that booty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Booty? Just dragon booty? It would be up where the dragon sleeps, not down here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's some under the ice right here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I will peer down into the ice below us with my 21 perception.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You glance down, and after pushing some of the snow out of the way, it's amazing that Grog didn't see this at all, but not really when you think about it. Encased in this pedestal that Vorugal had taken as a perch, beneath multiple feet of thick, locked ice, you see an incredible amount of hoarded gold, silver, platinum glittering as bits of light break through the overhead clouds, as the sleet is still raining down in places. Bits of it gleam and shift and shimmer. You can see finely crafted knick-knacks and statues and gems and antiqued metals all buried deep beneath this platform. It looks to be pieces of ornate armor and weaponry, all sorts of a random assortment of items that are locked beneath feet of ice, right there before you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nothing there, Grog. Sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No! It has to be here somewhere!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) Just look right there, friend.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) Right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where? What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's my BFF.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I see it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah, once he points it out, you immediately clarify and the red haze that was covering your eyes suddenly fades and you see shiny.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use the siege portion of the Titanstone Knuckles and start smacking the shit out of this ice trying to get down there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just like (smashing noises).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I deal double damage against objects or structures.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, and as you start, each punch, the ice (splintering noise) more cracks begin to spider out. An incredible feat of strength and you can see the dragonborn take a few steps back at this view, and Tooma is almost intrigued at this point, staring with this grin across her face as this symbolic destruction of what represented Vorugal's lording over their entire life is being ripped apart by this half-giant madman. A few more punches through and a whole portion slides off and you have to move out of the way. You knock it aside with your fist and keep punching through and eventually you get about, over the next ten or 15 minutes, breaking through enough of the ice that you start hitting (clanging), starting to hit the actual outskirts of this large pile of gold pieces.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, Grog. Can I check for any traps or is it like totally fine? Because I've been here before and it's not pleasant.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I really wouldn't mind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Investigation? 18?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, glancing about best you can in the vicinity, you don't see any traps.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about the gemstones? Those are up high. I'm staying away from those.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're outside the perimeter of the gemstones or the the main portion of the lair, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the orbs are embedded in the top restful area. The actual hoard is hidden, locked beneath the ice at the base of this large platform, so you're essentially punching through the bottom portion. Much like any sandcastle, the further you go, the less structural integrity it has. You're starting to make headway into releasing and finding access to some of the horde yourself.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need heat, and more than my wee urine can generate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can give us a little bit of fire?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, or get Keyleth over here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have dragon's breath?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She points to two of them and brings them over and two of the dragonborn step forward and release this torrent of flame into the area that you've already carved out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, they can do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it only lasts a few seconds and it causes a portion of it to melt back, but it's still extremely strong ice and it didn't have as much of an impact as you hoped it would've. This is very, very sturdy white dragon-conjured, ice-protected walls.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just keep on punching it, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just punch it. You're doing some good damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But no fireballs?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a fireball. I'll send a fireball over there. Back up a little bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why? What if I want to be close?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, you'll get burned.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're way down by 101 hit points, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know. Yeah, I'm still up in the three digits. Let's make it exciting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not going to burn you, Grog. Just take ten feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, all right! Ten feet!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll send a wand of fireballs down. I don't know, is that magic actually hot when it goes off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's hot and it's an explosion. It's not just fire. It's an explosion. So it detonates from the inside of that small concave path that you had punched through and as it hits and detonates you can see the ice further crack. The ice begins to crack even further and portions of it, you see a bit of snow bank that had gathered at the top shakes free and off the side, revealing some of the upper platform.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't want to make too much of a disturbance here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we don't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's just take some stuff on the outside.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there any free platinum or gold or little bits I can start to put in my hands?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can start scooping bits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You might want to ask Tooma if she has a problem with you taking all of Draconia's gold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're, like, plenty loaded already. However, it is a tradition to take little bits here and there as keepsakes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, we were able to free ourselves and have "access to this fortune a great deal thanks to your aid. We are more than willing to divide this "between your folk and ours."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That sounds most generous. Shall we look for specifically interesting little bits, or just grab the platinum?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just grab whatever's closest and leave.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there any interesting-looking weapons or unique items that are out of the ordinary?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Any looking-magically thingies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes! Minus two. 17.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Investigation, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) Do you want to add your bardic inspiration dice to that to be a dick?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Inspire me!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you suck or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I only got 16.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Something makes you stop and think, how did he get so handsome? How did he get so suave?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six extra points, so 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now Critical Role owes a royalty to the Beatles. All right, so, Grog, you find a painted gold war mask that looks really cool and nasty with the lower jaw. You're like, yes and you can put it on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, in fact, I lick it knowing that it's cold and I stick it to my face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Your tongue sticks to the mask.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck! And I rip it off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rip it off, all right. You take a point of damage. And your tongue is pounding with pain (throbbing) as the top layer of skin has been torn off your tongue. But the mask is still yours. You do also find a really beautiful black stone. It's really well cut and it's about that big and it's really pretty and dark and awesome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I love stones. I'm a fucking fan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You, looking through, you find a beautiful reddish ruby gem that has this slightly gold refraction in the center of it that's somewhat symmetrical, it looks otherworldly almost. It's beautiful. You see deeper within the actual hoard a ship's mast that was plated with gold that has been jammed in the center of the hoard, wreckage that was dragged here and included in the hoard. You do also see, amongst some of the gold, a small vial with liquid that is unaffected by the freezing temperatures around it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What color is the liquid?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The liquid is-- let me look that up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is my favourite part, getting new shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is like a thick syrupy metallic, like a liquid iron, a reddish metallic tint to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I had an idea until reddish, but I don't know anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you find a pair of boots that are made from a very thick, dark brown hide.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Another boots of haste! For sure!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're probably like elephant strength boots.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Definitely boots of haste! Pair of boots out of brown leather, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, a dark brown leather, not very elaborate in their design, but they're well made and seemingly have braved the cold weather well enough.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're Boots of Taste that you have.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I appreciate well-made boots.

lines.name: LIAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: They're Uggs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we have an approximation of the gold and platinum?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll get to that in a second. Sam!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, who?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whoa! What just happened?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one is a yellowish fluid with black swirls that shift on their own inside the vial's contents. As you shake it, you see they move at a faster speed and then slow down in a reverse direction. It's a very interesting pattern.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lava lamp.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of. Underneath that vial, you see a very beautiful--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, sheets of paper!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I love this shit. It's like walking into a Toys 'R' Us. It's the fucking best. It's like, "Which way do I go?!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Find the Plate of the Dawnmartyr.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was easy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go! You find a gold and platinum band that is two separate bands that are woven together like a braid in a band.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like a back braid?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The handle comes a gradual upward curve. It looks beautiful, ornamental, like something you'd see in a temple as part of a centerpiece. But it's weighted properly for a greatsword and is far too big for you to ever possibly muster in battle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't use this, so I'll just leave it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait! Let's not be hasty! My god, it's beautiful!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I check it for traps?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Check it for traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is a natural 20, oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have never been so sure in your life that this sword: totally not trapped.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so hoping it talks to you now, I'm so hoping it starts talking to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 'Tis clean.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 'Tis clean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It weighs as much as I do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How's it feel, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Feels like money, money, money.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Speaking of money, money, money.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see now two of them are pulling two big carts over and are loading up cash in the area. This is going to push your bag of holding.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's why I said we can't take that much.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But if it's platinum, it'll help.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: More bang for our buck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What can we lose from the bag of holding?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm very emotional about some of this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Forget the dragons, let's go buy real estate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a third of what's in the hoard right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Park Place, motherfucker!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Build a fucking water park, let's go!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't need any more than-- This is really nice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's build a condominium.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Condos in Marquet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Parking garage, that's where it's at.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many gold is a platinum?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the gold to platinum transition here--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a lot. Scrooge McDuck over here is fucking swimming in that shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With Brexit, it's not worth as much any more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten gold pieces per platinum.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They don't need to know. No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could go to a warm place, the three of us, and live out the rest of our days.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll build a bank. It'll just be us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They'll never find us. We have the Dust of Tracelessness.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm tempted. This is amazing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. We kill Vex after the first month.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, I can hear you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was joking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We might need her to restart civilization.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: True, true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Meanwhile, for the last twenty minutes, I've been combing blood out of Pike's hair, and we've been having god talk, and as I put little fun buns in Pike's hair I say, "You know, sometimes I feel "like she is right there with me. I ask questions and I know the answers, but most of the time I "don't know anything. Does the balance ever shift?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, not really. It's part of what's great about it, is you put your trust into them and "everything turns out okay."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is so cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You saw her, she punched a dragon for me!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've got to find Larkin though, what do we do about Larkin?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, all right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're not here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I didn't like Larkin very much. It's probably for the best."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Aye, but he's out here on his own in the cold. Ravenites everywhere!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Dwarves are made of hardy stuff, I'm sure he'll be okay."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're probably right. Let me even you off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (pained) "Thank you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What did we find? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten dragon scales, the end.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strangely, as you begin to carve, the air, as freezing as it is, actual touch on the skin of Vorugal is colder, and there's a few moments where your fingers begin to adhere to the cold and you have to pull back a bit. But you do manage to carve from the hide, if you can carry it properly, about 150 pounds of dragon hide.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh jeez. Oh boy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 150 pounds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We got 40 pounds of black dragonhide in the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well we now apparently have 150 pounds.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to have to fill the Whitestone coffers with some of this stuff when we get back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog is dumping stuff out of our Bag of Holding.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's going too. There's a totally decomposed orc head. A brain chunk, two dark elf heads, one random arm, a piece of bulette armor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That shit has been festering for months!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Twelve beef jerky strips are going.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was saving that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're doing this, Tooma is watching you, going--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: By the way, this is totally up for grabs, anytime you want. You say something to me and we'll work it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (speaks Draconic) Another dragonborn walks over and picks up the beef jerky strips, hands them to Tooma, and Tooma keeps watching you all, chewing on one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're starving.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm throwing out a greatsword and replacing the platinum greatsword in its spot so that should make enough weight out. Bye, black studded dwarven armor. That was the first thing in the bag of holding.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: By the way, excellent note-taking and keeping track of what's been in the bag of holding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well done.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Half of that body part stuff came out as gelatinous poo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's the gamiest of gamey meat you've ever touched.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just strings of-- You pull it up and you got to wrap it up in the string and toss it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys pull away portions of that, Kima helping out where she can. The sweat beads on her forehead; even among the cold exterior, she's a workhorse. You also manage to pry from Vorugal's mouth 20 individual dragon teeth that are harvestable outside of the ones the other Ravenites take for themselves. You manage to get six dragon talons pulled from the whole body, and about-- let's see, with all the destruction of the outside, and there is this creeping ice that's beginning to freeze the body from the inside, post-death-- the hide includes the scales, you have to pull off the scales and destroy the hide, and any other organs? You said the eyes, you were thinking about taking?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Blood. Eyes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have any more empty vials?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Empty vials? I'm out of vials.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you take any healing potions? If you did you'd have an empty healing potion vial.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In theory then, I have three empty vials because I did have three healing potions that I've used.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say you go ahead and recork three vials of white dragon blood.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything else?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go sit down for a little while, and breathe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to go into the mansion as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you guys go ahead and join Vax and Pike. Kima comes and joins you as well, to rest for a moment, while the rest of the Ravenites begin tearing off pieces of Vorugal's body, leaving the ribcage, the spine. They pull most of the organs out of it, but the tree itself is rooted into the ribcage and the roots reach down and burrow into the ground beneath it. It's left this really interesting sculpture that they've torn everything away from. At this point now, the Ravenites have descended upon the interior of the hoard, and they're hacking away at bits of ice to open up more of the space beneath, while keeping a very careful eye to make sure the structure remains intact. You guys have gathered what you decided to take from the hoard, and are doing what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scanlan. Vex. We should disable the orbs, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know how to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just beat the shit out of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wouldn't that alert Thordak?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't want to taunt him first?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'd rather him not know, right now, that Vorugal's dead because--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He would instantly know that we're not in our home base, he could launch an attack on that place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Maybe let's not do that just yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But what if he comes here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well if he does, hopefully they'll be inside their caves? I don't think he's going to leave Emon to come check out what's going on with Vorugal, unless he knows that Vorugal's dead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. Shall we check in with the other members first, before we biggity-bounce?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, let's go back to the mansion. Maybe we can destroy it on the way out, if we feel necessary.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about that big golden mast? You think there's a golden ship under there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if there's a skyship in here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I assume it wouldn't fly very well, but all right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe that's how the Ravenites can get to Emon, if they can help us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was made of gold, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gold plating around it. There are portions of it where you can see the wooden mast with large bands of gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did it look like airship or normal ship?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was hard to tell. From what you could tell, it is a mast. The airships you've seen do not have masts, since they do not use the wind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it was most likely a sea-faring ship, and was torn asunder, from a great distance and then dragged here as part of the hoard by Vorugal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are we going to do with a mast?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have no idea. Maybe on the way out we can see if it's uncovered any more.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll stick a Google Maps pin here. We'll always know it's here, because when we come visit Tiberius' grave, we'll also leave some flowers and take a mast with us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They've been working on this for a while now, is it possible to wiggle my way in and check out the mast now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, make an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You push past some of the Ravenite workers, their shoulders don't give and you have to squeeze through. As you get there, the upper part is still locked in ice, and the lower part is locked in ice. For how much they've carved through already, is the central portion, but what you can see is a wooden mast with large, thick bands of gold around it that are ornamental. You can see within them carvings and designs of a language you don't really understand-- actually, what languages do you know?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Elvish, Common, Undercommon, Abyssal and Draconic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not recognize this language, but it appears to be ornamental, and that whatever ship this belonged to was a prized ship of either a navy or merchant fleet. Based on some of the marks on it, it looks like it was grabbed and broken off a ship. Looking down below, there is a portion of a ship that is beneath it as well. Much deeper, maybe another 25 feet of solid ice below you with the rest of this hoard. There's a portion of this ship that was dragged here by Vorugal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's crazy. It's a ship! I'm coming back out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Let's go back to the main group and tell them what we've discovered.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're hustling your way up the ravine to the east, you pass by a number of Ravenites coming by with large sacks, and chunks of dragon meat draped over them. You can see the meat itself is freezing the air and shoulders of those that are carrying it. The essence of the dragon's ice-built form is causing them to constantly shift it because it's starting to stick to their armor, and you see icicles beginning to form at the outside of these large dragon-meat haunches that they're carrying.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When you dry-age meat like that, salt it first, then hang it. Just a pro tip.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (speaking Draconic). Keeps walking, doesn't seem to understand you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really bad sinus problems.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually you make your way back to Scanlan's Magnificent Mansion and gather the rest of the party. Percy, Kima, Keyleth and Vax are all there, resting and eagerly awaiting your return.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got to try and fix my guns.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make some tinkering checks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is this a misfire check or a tinkering check, since I'm not in combat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These are tinkering checks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ooh, 28!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your Animus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep, that's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe Bad News was also?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yup. 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 is fine. You manage to get Bad News functioning again in the workshop below. And Retort was okay, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, Retort's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you all return and gather around--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth has laid out the Vorgual spoils like she got back from a yard sale.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, by the way, is a macabre view as you walk in, and there's this smear of dark purple dragon blood, and long, haphazardly carved chunks of dragon hide, almost like the preset green lawn rectangles that roll out and smeared across the center of the foyer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I drop the Bag of Colding next to Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog, can you help me see how much we can shove in here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here, maybe like a sleeping bag, and I'll sit on it and you can wrap it up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, good deal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (squishing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When it's finally wound up, it won't fit within the Bag of Colding. The Bag of Colding is the size of a relatively large satchel. The dragon hide, rolled up, is about that big around, what you managed to carve off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah, shit. What do we do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we make Percy some dragonborn armor right now, somehow, so he can be all white, all over?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, that would be a thing, wouldn't it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How much do you think that roll weighs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 150 pounds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh jeez. We can't carry that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I could drag it behind me for a little bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan, do you have a room here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A room?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For cold things? You have everything here, do you have a chilly room?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The mansion will expire in 12 hours though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could bring it into the kitchen for now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we get everything else into the Bag of Colding, besides the roll of hide?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The teeth and those things can be put in the Bag of Holding. The only thing that needs to be preserved is the hide, until it's treated.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about the blood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The blood's been capped. That should probably be put in there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Three vials of dragon blood in the Bag of Colding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, mark three vials of white dragon blood in the Bag of Colding.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we have six talons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The talons themselves are large claws that have been removed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so we have six talons, 20 teeth and 150 pounds of hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Word.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got so much bling. We're stupid rich.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A lot of things that we don't know what they are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's that mask?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take the mask, and like Jim Carrey in The Mask, I stick it to my face and (yells).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you feel anything? What's it doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is chilly against your skin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel like it's making me fall in love with the first person I look-- Vax!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, you don't want to fuck with this. Are you sure?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, you're right, I don't.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take the mask off and put it in the bag of holding. But we got this! And I hold up the big-ass platinum greatsword.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can anyone identify things in our group?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I recognize the text on it? Celestial?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Celestial, yes, you do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you can read it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When did you learn Celestial?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was a very lonely child.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like Latin in the world of D&D.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like, covered with prunes, up and down the blade.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Priss, what's it say?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you calling him a priss?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughing) Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking across the symbols, they are specifically symbols speaking of creation, devotion, the power of a deity's love and the unity between god and creation. It is a very religious and holy text across the blade, both sides.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is some sort of paladin sword. It's a holy weapon of some kind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I bet Kima would want the shit out of that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, is Kima here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's right now in the process, in the kitchen, of massaging some of the bruising and wounds she took from the battle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Got some meat tenderizer on that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Couple of chickens on it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stop what you're doing. I want you to get your hands on this big, beautiful bastard. And I hand her the greatsword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where the heck did you get this?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I could tell you, but I don't remember.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Without leaving her eyes from the scrolling on the side, walks quietly past all of you in the center of the foyer, sits down with it and starts meditating over the blade.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I walk over and go, "Before you hit anything with it, you come talk to--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (shushing)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I leave.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anything else interesting?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I found a jewel. It's red. It looks pretty neato.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How were the dragonborn about us taking some of their--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They were great about it actually, they were quite generous.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anything else we should go back for, as well?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There was possibly a giant gold ship, underneath.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There was a what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gold mast, underneath the hoard. And also, much more gold and platinum that we can't possibly carry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, it had runes on it as well. Do they look similar to the runes that were on Greg-- Grog's sword?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the symbols on the side of weapon look like an ancient text, they're laid in a very ceremonial format. The text that you saw on the side of the mast looked more like an engraving.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did it look fluid?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was fluid.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a ship in the dragon's collection?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. I don't know if it was an entire ship, but it was a ship.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you didn't go in, you saw it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well I got down, but most of it was still frozen.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It got his attention and he kept it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It could take days to potentially melt the ice, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The ice is already melting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keek, you could probably melt your way in there in 24 hours.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I also have this. My new toy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should check that out before we go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we in any danger staying here, leaving our special hidey place unprotected?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not like anyone can get in here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'm talking about your homeland. Leaving it unguarded.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's as guarded as it's going to be right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We know that Raishan's out there, doing something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She was doing something previously. I don't think that anything awful is going to happen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I also took this little keepsake. I call it Stoneblack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because it's a black stone?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well don't fucking break it down like that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's so neat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it look fancy? Is it magic?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you Detect Magic, whoever can Detect Magic?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't. Wait, can I? No, I can't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can look at it and see if it looks magical.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, make an arcana check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is not magical. However, your keen bardic eye, looking at the gem, it is a very rare gem. It is worth quite a bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Platinum zirconia.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's actually a black sapphire, an extremely rare gem. It runs in the market anywhere between four to six thousand gold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So anyway, I got rid of my old saltlick rock and now I've got Stoneblack here to take its place. Do you have a pet rock?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god. I sleep with it, I put it under my back and it gets all the knots out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is the cutest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you paint a face on it, or anything?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've actually had a lot of rocks that are friends.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's great. You can make little clothes for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I didn't have a lot of friends growing up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sometimes I carry it in my armpit to keep it warm. You don't need to know about that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's very maternal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, and these boots!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Leather boots, could be anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are they magic, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh sure, I'll look at those. Wow, 24! Arcana check, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. They're very simple leather boots, there's no real ornamentation beyond being functional boots. As you take a moment to look at them, there is a faint shimmer to the leather itself. When the light hits it, the brown gives way to a slight purplish undertone. It looks to have some sort of enchantment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it seem evil or good?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have no idea. However, they look fancy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They are interesting, and I'm indifferent to such things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to put one on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go ahead, put one on, what could happen? We're in a safe place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just want to see what it does.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what if it's single use only?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, now's a good time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a boot, it's probably made for multiple uses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can take a short rest and take time with the item to figure out what it could do, if you want to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I attune to my staff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you attune to your staff. What are you unattuning from?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Currently my Ring of Protection.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's painful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: AC down!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So all your saves are down by two, your AC is down by two, for now. Good to know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: By the way, we have two unused Ring of Protections that we can trade for things. I have one that I haven't used in months.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like Stone of Jordans now. It's the thing you trade. Props to you if you know what that reference was. What do you guys want to do? Do you want to take a short rest to try and figure things out?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima's focusing on the sword, you're focusing on the boots.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm focusing on the war mask.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who else is doing what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there other things?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here's a beautiful red gem. It looks special.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does this actually look like a special gem?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which gem is this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The red beautiful gem you told me about.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, the ruby. It looks very pretty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got a vial with yellow and black swirly stuff in it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That requires somebody who knows things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll look at that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do a check on the potion since I've got alchemy training?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what? Yeah, if you wanted to take a look.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's some bracelets and such, I thought I'd take a look.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a gold and platinum band with braids.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah, I'll take a look at the back-blades.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The back-blades. That's nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Keyleth was taking a look at the potions?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about the bracelet, you also had a bracelet with a sapphire?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just gave it to back-blades over here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you had a ring and you had a bracelet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a platinum bracelet which I assumed was just fancy and pretty. Here, look at that one too, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I can only handle one of these, but we'll find out what happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you identify both potions, one of which is a Potion of Speed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I thought it was. The yellow one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. The other is a Potion of Invulnerability.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does it do? Read it! Out loud, with your mouth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For one minute after you drink this potion, you have resistance to all damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: God-mode!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The potion's syrupy liquid looks like liquefied iron.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So you half all damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Half all damage for a minute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is so insane.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then Potion of Speed: when you drink this potion, you gain the effects of Haste spell for one minute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm putting that in the party inventory.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no, no. Hand it out to somebody. Oh, that one should go in the party inventory.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which one, the Potion of Speed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Potion of Invulnerability, so we can decide later.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's for a very special day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog could take the speed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, do you want to take the speed potion, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, sure, I won't use it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Give the invulnerability to Laura.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, the boots. To you, Vex.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So many things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These are Boots of Feral Leaping. When you wear these boots you can instill your leaps with incredible bursts of power! As a bonus action you can attempt to leap. Make a strength check with a DC of 16. If you are successful you leap either 15 feet vertically or 20 feet horizontally.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (meowing)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you have to attune to them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't say!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There you go Grog. You need those.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does anyone want the Potion of Speed? I don't want it to be just my Christmas. That's amazing!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anyone need the Potion of Speed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you fail the check though, you fall prone where you stand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's important.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strength check, so you'll probably be okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Most of the time, but once in awhile--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once in a while banana peel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a question, because the spell that I was going to take, because I still have one spell that I haven't learned yet, is Jump, which triples your jump for one minute. So if I did that, would that triple that as well? Or would it just be Grog's normal jump?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That magic would override the spell, based on the enchantment. It's two different magical forces affecting the same thing. The Jump spell is part of the enchantment that boot was crafted around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, so that's perfect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The platinum band is not magical.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it is worth quite a bit, actually. The platinum band is worth about 2500 gold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a magic all its own.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the ring, who had the ring?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a platinum bracelet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The platinum bracelet was what he looked at right now. That's worth 2500.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wait, the gold platinum band? The band was a ring? Got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have the ring?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The cube shrinks to half its size.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A centimeter.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anything you are wearing or carrying is invisible with you. You remain invisible until the ring is removed, until you attack or cast a spell or until you get Backblaze. I don't need this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does it say attunement on it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does require attunement. It's a legendary item, meaning it's extremely rare. You know how you use a spell, and once you do something the spell's gone? That, while you're wearing it-- you can turn back invisible for another action. As many times as you want, for as long as you wear it. So situationally, it can be very useful, if you're trying to do infiltration or something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But not a bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It's less of a combat benefit, necessarily, in some situations it may be.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like going to a white dragon lair.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who wants to keep it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stealthy people need it, probably.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima is happy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kima is happy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima is very happy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What'd she get?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you just give away something amazing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can always take it back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As she stands up she takes the blade and swings it. It hits the ground, and when she hits you can see a spark of divine energy from the impact. She looks at her maul and goes, "Sorry, old "friend. You'll find a good new home. But I'd say this Holy Avenger is going to do me quite well."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's it do, Kima?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To give you specifics, it requires attunement by a paladin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, so it has to be a paladin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hitting a fiend or undead, the creature takes an additional 2d10 radiant damage on every hit. While you hold the drawn sword, it creates an aura in a 10ft radius around you. You and all creatures friendly to you in the aura have advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kima is now an associate member of Vox Machina.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Provisional.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Provisional, yeah. That's amazing. So the maul-- Kima, because I want to respect your weapon, what does the maul do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, you want the maul?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? No, I'm just saying, what it does, or does it just beat the shit out of people beautifully by itself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's about it."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool. You want me to hold onto it for you, or are you cool?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (thunk) I'm good for now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Boss. Total boss moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She can do 100 push-ups.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's true. Enjoy that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I shall."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I run downstairs to the training area with my staff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anything from the war mask?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but it is worth 750 gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll unlock its secrets. Wear him down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, if we're ever invited to a Masqueradé-- is that how you say it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but continue please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Paper faces on paradé.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I get a description of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a war mask, it's meant to inspire fear and give you an ominous presence on the battlefield.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it platinum?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's gold. Old, very old.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it go with his hat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you were to attach it some way, it would look very interesting.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would you like me to attach the mask to your fine hat?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To the back of his head.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, to the back of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So they don't know if he's going or coming.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, bring it downstairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're both metal, right? I can help you by heating metal, actually.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, let's just do this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you also put my title on the inside?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My title.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yes, of course.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go test this out, and I'll meet you in the workshop. I'll be right back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait! Are you going downstairs?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I want to see what this does.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I come with you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're all going downstairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a free mansion, man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You want to have a drink with me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So while you guys go downstairs, you two are going to the dining area?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there a lounge in the mansion, is there a bar?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there an aerated wine cellar? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Inside joke. I'm being teased right now for owning and using a wine aerator.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whoever sold you that and said it was an aerator is laughing their happy asses off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I appreciate fine things, and I'm not going to apologize for that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Some guy broke that off of his kid's toys and was like "It's an aerator!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So yes, that's where we'll go. We're going to go to the wine room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you guys find your way to the wine room. Scanlan, what are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A whole lot of nothing. I'll go down and watch the show, I guess. I'll watch the training show.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have the big sandpit that's cordoned off with the wooden outskirts, you have the various dummies set up in certain ways, you have the portion of the room that has the armor stand on the side, the weapon stand. What do you want to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh-hoo. Okay. All right. Everyone stay back. I'm going to start by casting the lowest level of spell out of it, see what it does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Apparently a Fireball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. At where?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whatever is further in the sandpit. I told everyone to stand back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone stays back. Furthest part of the sandpit is going to be one of the various combat dummies. So you launch-- put the staff down, you guys watch as in the centerpiece at the top, where that one gem is hovering and slowly rotating in place, the gem begins to glow bright red from its soft bluish-green composure. As it hits bright red, this beam of familiar red arcane energy streaks forward, hits it and detonates into a shaking explosion, destroying the wooden dummy and singeing the one immediately left to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whoa. Cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you see that, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Really nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was awesome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was that the biggest thing it does?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's three charges off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many charges are there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 20, and they recharge at the top of a day. They recharge 1d6 plus four.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. How many recharge a day?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 1d6 plus four.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So five to ten. Five to eleven.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because I've been really excited about this one, I'm going to point at the other dummy and cast Chain Lightning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you do, you watch as this giant bolt of electrical energy arcs off the same place on the staff, hits the dummy and the dummy immediately bursts into flames from the energy hitting the wood, and then arcs off and hits the two others. Suddenly the dummies are partially blown apart on one side, the charred section slowly smoldering as smoke pours up, and you can see bits of the electrical energy going (crackling) through the remainder of the wooden dummy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog. Did you see that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit. That was amazing. I kind of want to get out there for whatever you do next.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, can you use this in Minxie form too?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hmm, I don't think so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, you think so, or you don't?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Burning through all the charges, but I don't care.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you have another one you want to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Watch this Grog, watch this. I'm going to do Conjure Elemental.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and which elemental are you going to conjure?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What elemental?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Earth, big!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Earth!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as she slams the staff in the ground and you feel this quaking, and the sandpit behind her begins to slowly billow and rise up. As the sand falls away from underneath, you see, standing behind and looming over Keyleth, this giant, cracked stone earth elemental, very much like the form she often takes, standing behind her. Its eyes flash up with a bright green glow and it sits there, awaiting her command.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then I do a bonus action and I also turn into an earth elemental.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right, because you got your forms back at a short rest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes I did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So now she turns into the same form. There's now two elementals there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fight, fight, fight!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then we walk by and we Top Gun each other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Each slam itself causes the air around to (cracking) like a small thunderwave in its own right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then we both turn and look at Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then I punch Grog in the face!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll an attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural one!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not a spell attack, is it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was for me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And for the other elemental, what's your bonus? As an earth elemental, what's your attack bonus? Because the other elemental is going to punch him at the same time too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He gets a plus eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus eight? That's a 16, that does not. So here's what happens. In slow motion, Grog stands there with a big grin on his face, and both fists go (slamming) and glide off, no impact. And you're still dumbfounded and enjoying the moment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (gruffly) I did that on purpose.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I understand what she's saying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you hear (rockslide crashing).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I drop my form to hear what Grog has to say.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That sucked. That was the worst one of all of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did it hurt you when we punched you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, like-- wait, is the beard all right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The beard is fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, okay, no. It's all good. Does it do anything else than whiff?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well. And I tell the elemental to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it does nothing else.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Attack Grog again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let me turn around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is an 18.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't miss, what it does is it hits you and you're like (slamming). You barely felt it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How was that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh man, yeah. Really, whew. Stout.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really? Yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I'm questioning my faith now.

lines.name: MARISHA
