lines.text: Man, this staff is so powerful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, sure is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jeez, wow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not that I want to feel any more damage after that hurricane of pain, but does it do

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can keep burning the fucking charges.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By the way, you've now burned 14 charges.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, I know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give me one really big one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Goddamn it. I hope we're not fighting anything so I can recharge these.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's going to be like three days for her to get them back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does this thing protect you at all?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's a damage-dealer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't do any more. Don't waste any more, Marisha. Don't do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're not there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's why I said Marisha.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to wait. I'm going to see. I'm going to save some action. Real fast, just in case-- and I whack him with the staff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like Rafiki?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and roll a d20. Add your strength modifier and your proficiency modifier.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My strength and my-- Let's see, 18. No wait, 19!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. What's your AC, Grog?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Aww.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whack!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (melodramatic groaning) Oh, the pain of-- what's this thing called? Confires! It hurts so much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow, really?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel the reflux-- the conflux.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, it gave you acid reflux?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's real bad. I have to leave because I feel like I might toss.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's good to know. It induces sickness?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I feel like I'm going to cry too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, good to know, all right, thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I leave, holding my forehead and laughing. Small, little laugh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm good for now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, you're going to the workshop, you said?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, grabbing the helmets and here, I'm going to borrow you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And now I go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (aerating noises and laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know what any of these are; do you know what's good and what's bad?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pick the one that looks the fanciest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You were better at that than I am.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go to the corner-- the highest shelf, I don't fucking know. These are probably all fake wine anyway. I fly up and grab the one on the highest shelf and fly back down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You grab it, look at the label. It's a Pinot Noir, and the title of the brand says Le White Meat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, it's chicken wine. Fuck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no, is it really?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whatever, we'll drink it anyway. It's going to be disgusting.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's actually a drink called Cock Ale, which is brewed in a dead chicken.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's regular red wine. But definitely is labelled with a chicken on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's funny.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm grabbing a random Two Buck Chuck next to me on the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Same label. They're all the same wine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, hey, hey. To Vex'ahlia, the dragon slayer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck yes!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (slamming) Oh shite, we should do it for real.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, right, what's up?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh man, I'm proud of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that all you wanted to say?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't think so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, that's three of five.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know if we're all going to live, but I think that collectively we might actually pull it off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we have a good shot of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Almost bit it, out there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I noticed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Scary.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I have a hug?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm glad you're not dead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, old news. We've done it before, we'll do it again. Hey, do you want to try jumping around with those boots?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I gave them to Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You want to try to jump around anyway?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What can you do? How high can you go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I jump. It's a jump. A normal little jump.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's good, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No reason, I'm procrastinating.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah. So tell me what you're procrastinating about?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long are you going to torture yourself for?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you fuck. (laughing) What? (muffled) What are you even talking about right now? Do you want to see how high I can jump now? So high. I get on my broom and I fly up to the ceiling.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Push out the wings. No, I can't!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you already used it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Will you come down here and talk to me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (groans) Fine, fine! Hi.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. What are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know! I don't-- what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know I've known for a while? It's all over your face, I've known you since you were a baby, I've known for a while.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. (nervous laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've almost died. You

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He died.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are you fucking doing, Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sighs) It's just timing, you know? It's all timing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Timing could have you dead in the ground tomorrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is true.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And do you know something? Hey.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hmm?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He leads with this. Not with that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: His collarbone?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Fucking smart-ass. Maybe he'll surprise you, but I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think he isn't thinking that way at all, and honestly--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (snorts) You're a dummy. I'm the dummy, why are you such a dummy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doesn't it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What the fuck do we have in this world except for moments with each other? That's all we've got.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want you to have some happiness in your life.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want you to have a little more. There's no reason to hold back. Why?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wouldn't it be so awkward though?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who cares? You know what's awkward?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hmm?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A life not lived.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got you, sometimes, when you're not with Keyleth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Listen, you're my sister, and I love you very much, and I know a lot about you, and I can help you in a lot of ways. But not every way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There are facets of you that have nothing to do with me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Very few.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want you to be happy, and we all could be dead in a week. You know that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm a fucking idiot. I don't know anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughing) I want you to remember that you just said that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I never forget it. Ever. In the game or out of the game, Laura.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, don't!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a short life we got. I'm not going to tell you what to do, but I won't tell you what to do. I do want you to be happy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you. And I'll try.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And on a side note-- he's a little fucked up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And he

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that's not true.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who does he listen to?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth. They're like, so close.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, they enjoy each other's company, I know that, but you're really the only one who he listens to. So I need you to-- he has impulses. He has impulse control. I have impulse control.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes you do!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He has a different kind of impulse control.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. You want me to control him then. Get him under my thumb. Bring him to the light, just a little bit?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know what I'm talking about.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know what you're talking about.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take another bottle of wine and I (gulps).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughing) I thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Am I drunk, am I at disadvantage now, if do the whole bottle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In a minute you will be, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grab another bottle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hm? Glug glug glug? Well, all right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (groans) I want to go see some fireballs get shot, I'll see you later!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, have fun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Woo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Vax sloppily leaves the room, you're left in quiet, by yourself with your--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (booming) And I walk away!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pop Trinket out, cast Speak with Animals and have a nice fun conversation with him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're going to go ahead and take a break here, come back here in a minute, use the restroom.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, we haven't done shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone and welcome back to Critical Role! After a barrage of delightful phrases that were just shouted at me. It's great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Love you, Matt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Love you too, guys. I do want to say real fast that our wonderful Kiki Day, who made a number of other Vestiges--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fenthras!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Made Fenthras, made--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And the Spire!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Made the Spire of Conflux, which you can see on Marisha's twitter right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Geek & Sundry's twitter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's fucking fantastic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a badass motherfucking belt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (McCree voice) Just saying.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Oprah voice) Spire of Conflux!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (normal voice) Anyway, let's get into the game. You guys, finishing those scenes. Taking a short rest. You roll your hit dice to heal up a bit. What more do you wish to accomplish? What's your next plan of action, Vox Machina?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we pack up all of our things and raid a ship.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then head back to Whitestone. I mean-- Oh, no, we're fine in here.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Are we?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to rest before we do that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have to rest. We're all severely injured.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, some of us, yes. I say we take a night, we hit the ship and then head home.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's good wine!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he's drunk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys got into the wine?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you aerate it first?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How do you do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you don't have an aerator, you can put it in a mason jar and shake it up a bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We just drank it out of the bottle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that's just pedestrian, really.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have so many.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Put some ice in it, keep it cold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we still melting a mask to a helmet?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We had a little bit of metallurgy to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a tinkering check, and this, actually, make--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I help him with my Heat Metal spell like a soldering iron.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! That being the case, it's going to help with the metal's pliability. Go ahead and make your regular dex-based.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Regular dex-based? All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Would make it strength-based for the metal, but the Heat Metal is helping you with that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Big money, no whammies!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26? Yeah, without an issue you manage to apply the mask onto the back of the helmet after looking at some brief glances at the shape of Grog's head, making sure that it has a hinge so if he leans forward, it doesn't restrict or press into his back if he looks up. It is a functional backmask onto his delightful pointed helmet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've also carved, in Elven, in the inside, "Kick Me."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the inside of the mask?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. So it's there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's magnificent.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shall we present it to him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, let's.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like we should go at this with a little bit of theatricality. Just because it's so much fun to fuck with Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How do you want to do this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh! I turn into an elephant. Get on my back!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did you say that before turning into an elephant?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, I do! Get on my back!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (elephant sound)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For god's sake, Vax, stop aerating more wine! We've had enough!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sam is so over it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, never!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy's on my back and I'm an elephant holding the mask while we go find Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, first you get to the doorway of the workshop.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a temporary fucking mansion. I bust through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know how to-- Will you put this in dice jail for me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you roll?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know. What do I roll for a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look it up. You add your strength modifier as an elephant.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I don't know what an elephant's stats are!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to find it right now. I'm going to find for you what an elephant's stats are! Just going to go look it up for you!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I rolled a two!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rolled a what, a two?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, a two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not going to work!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm a fucking elephant and it's a door!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's plus six because it has a strength of 22 because it's a goddamn elephant. So eight. You (slam). It lurches ever so slightly, but that is a very strong doorway. It's almost like the arcane nature of Scanlan's magic makes a good home.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I try it again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hit it again. Make another strength check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's much better! 16 total!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doesn't get that much further, but you're starting to get a serious headache.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we hearing this? Are we hearing a massive commotion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're starting to hear it now. There's this low, general slamming sound in the mansion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, do you hear that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do. Doesn't sound right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we go find out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I pull out Mythcarver and run down the stairs!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take out the bloodaxe and I follow him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another strength check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They get better with each time. 19!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. The door gets knocked partially off of its hinges and the frame is now slightly bent forward. The wood is splintered and the stone has more cracks into it. The headache is now pounding.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I should have thought about this!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys hear another, even louder slam this time. As you rush down to the outside of Percy's workshop you see some crazed, large, shifting gray movement of some creature, on the other side of the doorway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jesus! Scanlan, is this one yours?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. It's definitely an intruder.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Then we fucking kill it! We race forward and attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, both of you guys roll a--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, is Percy still riding?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see Percy, because Percy's above you!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Am I aware of this happening? At all, I don't see them at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because you're inside the workshop and you're above the doorframe she's slamming into.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Scanlan, you go running with Mythcarver in the air, and as you go to strike, Grog shoves you out of the way, in the middle of his angry grab and you go skidding across the ground, Mythcarver spinning out of your grasp across the floor. Are you making a single attack or are you doing a full round of attacks on this beast?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is a giant beast, I'm giving it what for!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So roll another attack, are you raging for this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I'm not raging. (laughing) 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, both hit. Go ahead and roll damage on both attacks, non-rage damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, go with it. Go with it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 20 points, four points of necrotic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know, I don't hit lightly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Elephant's going to die.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 22 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 42 points of damage from your maximum of 76 hit points as an elephant, as all of a sudden, what little bit of vision you have through the pounding headache, you glance through in time to see Grog's form (roaring) run up and slam his axe into you twice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much damage?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's my form?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I fucking headbutt him, I'm going to gorge him! Let's go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to gorge him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scanlan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Careful Grog, it has some protection magic on it. It threw me across the room! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Marisha. I would like you to roll for a gore attack against Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is ridiculous.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do I add? I don't have a stat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18? No, I don't think that hits you. So you go ahead and try and gore Grog, and Grog ducks right beneath the two giant ivory horns.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I knock down the doorway a little bit more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. 20 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, as you duck below, the elephant slams through the archway, sending stone and pieces of wood flying, and stumbles past. You duck down to try and the avoid the attack, going underneath the elephant as it begins to stomp over you into the room. You see this as you spin around. The elephant bursts in, and it is very much an elephant, you can see now, with Percy on top being dragged through the rubble.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm thankfully wearing a helmet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's got Percival!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll off! Roll off, Percy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (deadpan) Oh help. Help, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's so weak he can barely speak!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We must kill this elephant.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We must destroy this beast!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan and Grog, what are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, buddy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We got to kill this thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you go. Come on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will throw a Wand of Fireballs at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many charges does it have left?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, plenty. I have only used one of seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But each time you use it-- okay. Not quite how it works, I don't think.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just look at the shirt, Matt, just look at his shirt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you're right. One charge is a third level spell, I misunderstood. So you launch your Fireball, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wait, what is the damage? It's 8d6. Got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 8d6. Keyleth, I need you to roll a d20 minus one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Goddamn it Gil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Percy, I need you to roll a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not bad, that's 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, what was the damage you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to roll a dexterity saving throw, with advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm still wearing my cloak, so do they get disadvantage on attacks against me? Because I'm in the Cloak of Displacement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're an elephant though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're an elephant in the Cloak of Displacement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But whenever I Beast Shape I absorb my items.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would have been something to mention earlier, so going forward the attacks will have disadvantage, but you have to remember that for it to have an effect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But they're just now rolling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He hasn't attacked yet, he's rolling because a Fireball just blew up in his face!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got a natural 20, so I'm good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's half damage to you. You said it was 26 damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still up. The elephant that's now storming through the center-- hold on, I have to go with the battle music for this now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where's your battle map?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --storming through the center of the foyer, is now spinning around, flames exploding, engulfing Percy, Grog. The elephant is now covered in blood and scrapes. That finishes your go. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before I'm done I'm going to inspire Grog and say: Grog, remember. They never forget! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take your d12 inspiration.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you. I'll take two strikes at the elephant's ass. That's a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With disadvantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Well, that's a one, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. You still have the second attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a two.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (heavy footsteps)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you go--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, it's not a two!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So the second one was 16, the first one was a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It still hits. You rolled a two and it still hits because its AC is 12. It's very big and easy to hit. Go ahead and roll damage on the next attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, nice. What a joy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not hard to hit an elephant.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we also say that the two winos have come down to watch?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we're staring from the top of the stairs at all of it happening.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The first one is 20, with four points of necrotic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You only hit with one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How much was that, 20 points?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so Keyleth, you yourself take 12 points of damage. As your axe swings through and slams into the elephant, the elephant's form suddenly vanishes, as your axe cleaves through Keyleth a little bit, causing her to fall back and catch herself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Percy still on her back, piggy-backing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In a second, Percy goes (thud) on the ground next to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (pained noise)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy, you've been riding Raishan! Die, evil witch!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog! It's Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, Grog, thank you! That elephant ate me! You saved me!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sometimes I don't know if you guys would live without me. I'm really glad I'm around, sometimes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't imagine it. I legitimately cannot imagine it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, is that my helmet?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ayy, Fredrickstein the Science Guy, nice job! Look at that! That is beautiful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) He's drunk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The elephant ate this too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's Dr. Fredrickstein, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there poo on it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's clean. It's perfectly reasonable.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, the mask's on the back. Did you write on the inside like I said?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is engraved in Elven on the inside, it's lovely.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It looks like writing. What's it--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's your title, sir.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: --is that? What language?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that? It's Elvish.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, it's Elvish? So not everybody knows what my title is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's meant to be secret.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Very smart. Did you see my title?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did, it's impressive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wrote it down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did you? Oh dear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I knew it was going to be handy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will put on the new mask slash horned helm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It feels impressive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, because now the mask is facing the back, right? Can I fucking turn it around and put the mask on the front, with the horn sticking out the back like a big Nike swoosh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. It's not as comfortable, but it definitely feels badass.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (muffled) I don't feel like this is the best--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You sound very intimidating.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like I'm going to have to write some house rules from now on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It'd be good to have a list of things to ignore, I agree.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You need some of those blue guys with an aerator at all times down in those cellars.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Blue man group?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One of your blue guys! The blue guys! That disappears with this place--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're all female servants. I don't know how many times I need to say this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, nobody farted in our wine tonight. We had to drink it regular.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am sorry for your loss, because it's really excellent once you let it breathe and open up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's pretty good right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, now that I got my helmet, are we going down to the ship?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I propose that we have an evening's rest. In the morning--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We should go now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. Maybe you need to rest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I think we need an evening's rest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have 25 hit points. I'm fine!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Well, Pike is resting because she was hurt quite badly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but did you see her fun buns, though? I did those.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You did her fun buns?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I pulled little fun buns--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh! Okay! That's good--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you think I meant?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I didn't think anything, I'm going up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What else does fun buns mean except for little, cute, little hairballs on your hair?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll give you a book later.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah! You have a book?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a few. I have a library.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You guys! We got to find Larkin!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right, so you guys take your long rest. You regain your spells, you're all full hit points, you regain half your max hit dice. So if you spent more than half of your hit dice, you still--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we keep our hit dice from our Heroes' Feast? If we never got rid of them? Or are they gone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. By the time you'd wake up, they'd be gone, probably.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you use the hit-- never mind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When they wake up in the morning, Vax has a bill under his door for three bottles of wine. And Vex for one bottle. And Keyleth for a construction bill of 5,000 gold pieces.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I promptly rip the fuck out of my bill.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think it's a scam, and I throw it away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Well-rested. A fresher day. The mansion, growing fairly close to probably expending the rest of its magic. What do you guys do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that ship. I don't know if it has pirate symbols, but I'm very excited.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So wait, do we need things-- how far under the ice is it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Probably a bit. Having the ability to melt some ice would probably be helpful. Also, you're going to have to do the tree teleport and possibly we want to deal with reforestation of some kind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Reforestation. Oh, sure because the Ice Age wiped out--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have to go out like Captain EO. It's a thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just throwing this out there, is there anything to gain by going up to the dragon lair and communicating with Thordak? Is there anything we want to say to him?

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Misdirection? Taunting? Anything?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like, you suck. You can find us at the Glintshore? LIAM:	We don't even want to take an hour for me to slip this on and go see if there's anything of value?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Up in the lair?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can do that while we look at the ship.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not a bad idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But don't go alone. You can still get hit with traps.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can look for those. I do like buddies to go. Do you need to go to the boat?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's all in the same place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. It's all in the same place.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can hover above you or something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's jauntily head over.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If there's a problem, we can call the others. We won't be that far away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Ooh! I slip Whisper into my pack and I put this ring on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) Ooh! Precious!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, so you have to attune to that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Gollum voice) Nasty!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Gollum voice) Nasty!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nasty woman.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Gollum voice) She's a nasty woman! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I may need a ringtone later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. All right, great. So you guys have put yourselves together. Kima and Pike joined you downstairs in the foyer. You make your way back out into the ravine just as the magic of the mansion fades. There you can see most of the dragon bones picked entirely off the corpse of Vorugal, except for the ribcage, still remaining as a landmark of the battle that took place with a central tree still sprouting from the top of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it any bigger?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the magic of Fenthras creates the tree and it stays that size as it sprouts. Who knows if over time it may grow? You haven't had the time to really tell. You guys make your way--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't know you are an artist.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's quite lovely, isn't it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's pretty amazing, yes. I appreciate this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're welcome. I did it for you, Keyleth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Certainly adds something, doesn't it? To the whole valley. It's quite nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Green.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see hundreds of footprints, up and down, through the snow, through the ravine; looks like there's been a lot of foot traffic to and from while you guys were resting. You make your way to the ice throne of Vorugal and you see a portion of it has collapsed inward. But you also see a lot of foot traffic around, most of the ice spires that remained up there have been broken. The remaining Draconian corpses that were adorning them were taken down, or aren't in sight. And you can see there are a few remaining dragonborn Ravenites that are stepping in and out of the cavern-like chamber that you largely punched through and they continued to excavate it into the night.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you could let them know that we're going to make one last venture into the ship and then we'll be on our way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk up to one of the guys going in, and say in Draconic, have you unearthed the giant ship yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, it does appear like the ship has seen many moons since it was originally taken, if that makes any sense. Like, it wasn't brought directly here. It looks like almost a keepsake that Vorugal has moved from lair to lair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispers) Oh, that's legit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Has some sort of sentimental value.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, wow! It had some engraving on it. You speak a lot of languages, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well. I speak a couple of languages, I read a couple.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does it look familiar?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What languages do you know?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Celestial, Elven, Common.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sylvan, Primordial, Druidic, Elven.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Giant, Common.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gnomish. That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't even know Common. No one has understood you this entire game!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike speaks Dwarvish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike does pick up on it. It is Dwarvish text.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I speak Dwarvish, but I can't read.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a problem.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a belt, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is Dwarven, and as Pike begins reading around it, this-- it's the name of the ship across the mast, which is "The Floebreaker." This ship appears to have been, at least in some way, shape, or form, designed as a means of travelling through very far north icy regions, meant to break through elements of heavy glacier flows and such. The construction of it, as you get closer to the actual bit of the ship that is there, you can see it's very heavily reinforced with metal and has a very rigid structure to it. The fine scrolling that you saw before, it looks to be partially filled with ice at times. So as soon as it broke away, you could see it's actually more of a harsh, broken Dwarvish runic writing to it. The ship has definitely seen a lot of wear and tear. That's about as much you can make out of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we get inside of it? Is there anything to see inside of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can attempt to climb inside if you want to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much is exposed right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is no entrance immediately visible, but you can break through some more ice or try to break through the actual deck to get there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I cast a Flaming Sphere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. A flaming ball begins to roll on the bridge of the ship.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where does it look like the most convenient entrance? With ice and stuff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe four feet away from where the ice begins. You can see there is one broken portion of the ship deck, maybe about a three-foot, four-foot hole that you could melt towards if you wanted to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, I'm going to concentrate my Flaming Sphere on that and start melting it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's taking a while. About how long does the spell last, the Flaming Sphere?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: About a minute, I think?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (hums the Jeopardy theme)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Flaming Sphere, up to a minute, yeah. The spell expires, the minute done, and you've managed to melt maybe three inches into the ice?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, go punch it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much was it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About four feet of ice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, fuck that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ugh! I got it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I step back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I start going Rocky-ribcage on this big piece of meat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make your strength check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. He continues to punch, and punch, and punch, and each one you see the ice crack, pieces of it break away. You get quite a ways to punching through towards the direction that you are currently melting before a lot of the ice crumbles and falls and almost buries you for a second. But you knock it away and pull yourself out of it as you do, scooping the shards that occupied the space where you were and get out of the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I cast a Gust cantrip over top of him to keep ice from falling on him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hope there's really something in here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Me too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keeps punching. You get to one point, and you hit, and you hear a (dull impact). You watch a crack spider up to the top of the throne.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we need to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Portion of the throne above you is now starting to crack and fall onto the side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I start running out of there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should get out. Let's go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I also back out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I need the three of you who are closest to it to make a dexterity saving throw, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use my Boots of Feral Leaping?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll be fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could've hanged back, but I've been meaning to say this whole time that I was creeping around the thrones, I'm just going to throw that out, that I'm up there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you see this happening. A portion of it, like a whole half side of it has cracked and is sliding down into the cavern that has been excavated by your party and the Ravenites.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So if I'm almost on it, should I be making a dex save as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you're almost on it--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was going to poke around and look around it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Only half of it's collapsing, I'll say sure. Go for it. You who offers me to let you make a dexterity saving throw, yes. I will take it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really? Did you really do that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a one, but I have lots of Luck left. And now I'm fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So that's a 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah. You manage to leap off and tumble in the snow to the bottom and don't have to worry about it. Travis?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eight. With advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 19. But I burned a Resolve.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you guys dart out, Grog and Keyleth unfortunately are left a little bit behind. You both are pummelled with chunks of hard ice and jagged points of broken frost there, dealing 13 points of bludgeoning and piercing damage to both of you. And you find yourselves partially buried in the ice that cracks off it. You see most of Keyleth's body is currently buried, just her head and arms are out. And Grog, you're about up to your waist now in broken ice and snow. And you're like, (grunts), and pull yourself out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look at Keyleth's arm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I see it. Can you get her out?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. I start moving the ice and pull her out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull Keyleth out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (coughing)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That didn't go well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's burrow straight into the side, I think, to be on the safe side. Let's stop melting ice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Isn't it buried completely at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, the entire excavation portion-- by the way, as you guys came back, most of the gold and platinum that was in there has been completely removed by the Ravenites over time. And this whole area that has been excavated so carefully left it in a precarious place. Those physical hits by Grog sent that whole south side of the throne to collapse inwards. So it's partially collapsed. There's a large pile of ice, rock and snow. And it's not very accessible from the current standpoint.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe it was one of Vorugal's first kills or something? And it's sentimental?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know, I'm irritated by it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think it might have given him a little bit of juice when he was at home.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you think it has some sort of icy-like--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Extra ability when he was here, maybe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could try, and maybe now that the ice is broken I can melt it through it easier?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why would a dragon keep a boat?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why would he?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe his woobie, you know--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like a blankie.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. You know about that, Percy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Some people like collecting ships, you know? Maybe he's a nautical kind of guy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, guns and ships.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was a nautical kind of guy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (hums the intro of "Alexander Hamilton")

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While we're all standing here with our thumbs in our butts, could I look around and see if I see a little stone, a little palantir?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are you standing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ugh, Luck again. Jeepers creepers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's up top.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If he's up top, I would have been up there with him, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm a crow. Circling around, watching him from above.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm invisible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I'm watching the area.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. What did you roll? 26? Yeah. You see within the north side of the throne, there are two orbs embedded in the ice, about a foot beneath the surface. Previously you saw more.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In the past, in other locations, you mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But half of the throne has collapsed as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And how far down are they under the ice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About a foot, a foot and a half from the surface.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Never mind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to go find my sister.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (groans) It's--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey! I'm invisible! Here I am.

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you see it? It collapsed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, I saw it. I dodged out of the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm right here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know! I'm looking at you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, but I'm invisible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm looking in your direction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Boop!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh, goddamn it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Remember those little round seeing stones?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a couple under the ice over there. Now, I was invisible so I don't--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You saw them under the ice?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You saw a couple under the ice?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A couple under the ice, a foot or two away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where were the other ones?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't see any other ones.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Were they there before it collapsed?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know. I was standing right beneath the throne when the throne collapsed. Then I found them.

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: Were they near the area that it collapsed?

lines.name: MATT, LIAM
lines.text: One of them was, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA, TALIESIN, TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fucking--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (caws)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hold on, did we maybe get-- is Thordak going to-- we should go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy, want to leave a mark anymore?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should tell Tooma that--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We left one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go find Tooma.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The handful of dragonborn that were there, after the collapse, were walking back to the internal cavern area. As you head back, a large portion of Ravenites have all come out of their caves, and right now are in the process of scouring the ruins. Some of them are putting armaments away. Tooma is out there, currently conversing with a number of the other community leaders that are deciding what the next steps are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I approach Tooma. (clears throat) Tooma, it's time that we make our departure very soon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to thank you so much for everything that you provided and everything that your people have done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I wish to thank you for your sticking to your word."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Of course. I would love to help and leave some parting gift in any way that I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The riches from the hoard will provide enough for us. You need not worry."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was your land like before Vorugal got here? I know it wasn't as icy and as frigid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It was without snow. We are at the south side of Wildemount. I hope this fades with "time, we are not bound for snow people."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can attempt to maybe revitalize your plant life as much as I can before I leave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You can do this?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "By all means. We would appreciate it."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have a good, strong people and I want to see your recovery. Just like I hope the same with mine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Me too."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anything that I can do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tooma?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know the stones we talked about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, they got jostled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It looks like that ice wasn't super-strong, and it collapsed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The ice was going to collapse eventually, anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What does this mean?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not sure exactly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thordak doesn't know what was here. But if he realizes Vorugal's been killed, he'll come looking. Potentially.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But you're going to kill this Thordak, yes?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah! With your help, I think. Just in case he comes before we get to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You should get to him quickly, then."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The whole time she's been talking, her braid has been going like a magical jump rope because I'm standing here doing this with it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not. The time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you find something--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Fucking dick! Stop it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you find an ice weapon in that ship beneath the throne-- anything magical, some sort of ice power, we may need it. That may be useful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Keep in mind for it."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go up to the group. Percy, Vax, I need to take time with this, so are you all all right spending the rest of the day here while I help them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. I ascend to the top of the ravine and I start meditating, and I cast Plant Growth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We all need to go up there anyway because that's where the trees are that we're going to transport through, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We make our way to the top of the ravine as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What level is Plant Growth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Third.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 3rd-level. Gotcha.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'm doing the eight-hour--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight hours!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Boy, guys!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Super boring day for us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep. Sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God, I want to get in that ship!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I start doing that and revitalizing their landscape as close to what it was before, giving their-- [no audio]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It affects all normal plants within a hundred-foot radius. So you have a very specific portion that you revitalize in the ravine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Well, I talked to Tooma and find out where she--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, no, all plants in a half-mile radius are--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I thought, yeah. In the eight hour one that's like, crazy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You talk to her about it, and she tells you, "The ravine itself does not have the nutrients to support crops, but we had farmland right "above the ravine."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Do you plan to still reside there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Once the snow melts, yes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll do what I can. And I go there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You get there, and through the use of your elemental magics, you easily cast aside the snow. And from underneath, you can see where once there was a heavy amount of cropland that has all died off because of the recent freeze that came with Vorugal. You take the eight hours to concentrate and as you, do you enrich the land. You can watch as many of these dead seeds come to life with green once more. Suddenly, you see sprouting bits of delicious cabbages and other forms of produce begin to spring to life and grow nutrient rich. As this happens, you can see a few of the Ravenites who followed you to watch this are taken aback and excitedly rush down to tell the rest of the people. The rest of you are bored out of your mind for the next eight hours.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kima and I are sparring.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Challenge Vax to a peeing in the snow contest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's had a lot of wine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, that was last night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you're pretty hungover, you don't have a lot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Distance and accuracy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sings a fanfare) I've brought one from your house.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It disappeared.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Damn it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, as you reach for it, there's nothing there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys have fun sparring for a while, you beat the crap out of each other off and on for a few hours and you both feel good about it. When the eight hours have finished, you guys reconvene.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: V-A-X. Your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vax is shorter than Scanlan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cursive, baby.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I want both of you guys to make performance checks

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Performance for peeing in the snow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, what what. He's got a really high modifier, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm sure he'll win.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you're going to win.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, even at his lowest it'll be higher I bet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You want to add your d12?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Zorro.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can add your own bardic inspiration.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, if he thinks of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a fair fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a fair fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is close, but as much as your cursive writing was on point, it was impressive that Vax was capable of cursive drawing the X, stopping and then crossing the X.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It stings when you stop.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's impressive, but you know my wang is built for power, not accuracy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As soon as the cube comes out: can I talk to you, do you mind stepping away?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With the cube out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You talking to me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, not you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure, yeah, I'm going to do nothing but stare at that bloody ship if I don't, so sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are you, after dying?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm trying really hard not to think about it, actually. I don't know, honestly. There hasn't been a lot of time to process.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, there hasn't. It's a lot in a few days.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would say it would be nice to be going home, except I know what we're going home to. So there's going to be no relief.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, not for a while, I don't think.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That creature hanging around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, death was not pleasant.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. I have to tell you something

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know what Fenthras means?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It comes from the Elvish words, I'm surprised. Growth and protection.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would've eventually looked it up. It's the sort of terribly boring thing I would do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's odd that Saundor had it for so long, since he was quite the opposite of that, don't you think?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I tend to think that many people tend to exalt the exact opposite of what they are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. I don't know, I think he focused for so long on the betrayal of his love, on all of the horrible things within himself that caused that, that he became the physical embodiment of it. And I think he was trying to do the same thing to me. Even though I refused him, I could feel those seeds being planted. Self-doubt and loathing echoing in my mind every night. Reliving every wrong that people have done to me and everything I have done.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I recently-- I will say, before death-- had a bit of an epiphany, and have been trying-- not always succeeding, but trying-- not to dwell on such things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's actually what I wanted to talk to you about. In the fight with Ripley.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your last words to her were, "I forgive you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was such a surprise.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pull out Fenthras and I show him what I've carved onto it, it's "sinaeth." Do you know that word?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How common is that word?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know the word.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would know the word.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's forgive.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I carved this on Fenthras because that's the key, isn't it? It's the only way to really grow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think so. I'm trying. It's the only thing I've tried that's made any sense so far. And it felt very liberating, it felt good, it felt perfect. And it wasn't about her. It was just about me. Honestly, that was really the thing that I noticed, was I didn't say it to make her feel better, I didn't say it to give her any peace. I came to that feeling before running into her. I didn't know if it would be true when I saw her, but I feel like so much of my energy had been such a waste. And worse than a waste, it had been twisted in the wrong direction. And it's too late for a lot of things. There are things I cannot take back and things that I have done that will forever be terrible, but that's not the point, I suppose.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It isn't. Whoever that boy was that created those things, that suffered such horrors that he felt they were justified? You have to forgive him, too. Because everything you've suffered and endured and created in that time has made you into the person you are now. And you have a brilliant mind. And any darkness that might cloud your vision on occasion, the fact that you found it within yourself to forgive her means that it will never overtake you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. I would like to think we're all better than we think we are. Except maybe your brother. I think he's just a mess.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's terrible, isn't he? Just the worst.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is he in here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe, he's probably hiding somewhere.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. I know I have to forgive myself. I'm not quite there yet, but I can see a path. I like where we are and what we're doing. I think that we're the right people in the right place and the right time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I agree. And this engraving is a reminder that every time I attack, it's not out of vengeance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would be horrified if you were taking yourself too seriously.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Never. Did you see the bear that I carved on the tree? It's quite lovely.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was quite lovely. I don't know if the tree is quite as happy with it, but I was quite impressed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What room are we in, out of curiosity?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's no room, we're in the woods.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So we'll talk later. And I walk away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Anything can happen in the woods.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bless you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (high-pitched) Oh shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it's ten o'clock. We're going to go ahead and end today's session.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bam, motherfuckers! Bam!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) Go on and kiss the girl.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man, oh man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you guys for watching! That episode had a lot of interesting moments.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The spoils of war.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A whole bunch of new shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at our signatures in the snow, that's fucking beautiful!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There was pissing, there was kissing, there was everything!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pissing and kissing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pissing and Kissing is the title.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a good title.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I shit it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're welcome, Internet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well then. We'll get ourselves to rest for the evening. You guys do the same, thank you for hanging in there. Once again, amazing community, we love you guys so much, all the support you have. Make sure to dig into all the awesome charities that we support, and you guys support as well. We're continuously getting messages from them, blown away by the generosity of the Critter and Team Hooman community, so thank you guys so much for your support on those.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, Backblaze.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Thanks, Backblaze!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That amazing commercial. They're always so good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I guess until next week, guys. Is it Thursday yet? See you then.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit, man!
